While credited as a Tom and Jerry cartoon, this is not the cat-and-mouse team but an earlier Mutt-and-Jeff rip-off featuring them going about to survive in today's turbulent Chinese political scenario.  
And what that means is nearly constant urban chaos with the Chinese government during busy party moments screaming orders and cracking down on stray kittens "**Beware!**"
I'll always remember two old ladies cutely chasing a free kitten on their rickshaw

Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. But it was still entertaining.

It must have been great to see your favorite film enacted by yourself...

Fortunately there was no love triangle or a couple of boring young couple. I think
the lack of foreknowledge about themselves as actors helps the story with its found-footage idea.
